cyclone.name: ARTHUR
cyclone.current_location: about 190 miles ENE of Cape Canaveral, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: Arthur is tracking north-northeast, then northeast, remaining offshore the east coasts of Florida and Georgia and approaching the Outer Banks of North Carolina by Monday.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or just east of the Outer Banks, North Carolina

weather_observation.watch_coast: Surf City to Duck, NC including Pamlico and Albemarle Sounds
weather_observation.warning_coast: None in effect as of this advisory
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Atlantic coast from central/northern Florida northward to the mid-Atlantic states
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None (Tampa not listed in probability table; nearest sites are on the Atlantic Coast)
weather_observation.wind: Only a slight uptick in breezes possible; no tropical-storm-force winds expected at Tampa.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected on the Gulf coast near Tampa.
weather_observation.rainfall: Little to no additional rainfall from Arthur at Tampa.
